title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library that wraps Ollama’s REST API for chat, generate, embed, pull, and list operations.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers, exposing the same generate/chat/embed endpoints.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that adds Ollama models as LLM and chat components with tool-calling support.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama-WebUI) for chatting, model management, RAG, and multi-user workspaces.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API, streaming, and Android compatibility.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async wrappers for Ollama’s REST endpoints.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Minimal React chatbot example consuming Ollama’s streaming JSON endpoint via ollama-js.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and PVC support.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfile recipes for CodeLlama, Vicuna, Zephyr, SQLCoder, and more.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG pipeline using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store for PDF Q&A.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models using slash commands.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that threads Ollama responses, supports model switching via emoji reactions.

title: ollama-cli-tools
summary: Collection of Bash scripts for bulk model pulling, tagging, and GPU memory profiling.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat interface with session memory, model selector, and token-speed metrics.

title: ollama-nest
summary: NestJS module providing dependency-injected Ollama service with RxJS streaming.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust client (separate from ollama-rs) with tonic-based gRPC experiment branch.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir wrapper using Finch HTTP client and GenServer for back-pressure when streaming tokens.
